org.apache.logging.log4j.core.filter

类 AbstractFilterable

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.AbstractLifeCycle
      • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.filter.AbstractFilterable
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Filterable, LifeCycle, LifeCycle2
    直接已知子类:
    AbstractAppender, AbstractConfiguration, AppenderControl, LoggerConfig

    public abstract class AbstractFilterable
extends AbstractLifeCycle
implements Filterable
    Enhances a Class by allowing it to contain Filters.

      • stop

        public boolean stop(long timeout,
                    TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Cleanup the Filter.
        指定者:
        stop 在接口中 LifeCycle2
        覆盖:
        stop 在类中 AbstractLifeCycle
        参数:
        timeout - the maximum time to wait
        timeUnit - the time unit of the timeout argument
        返回:
        true if the receiver was stopped cleanly and normally, false otherwise.
